title: Provider
description: A provider is a deployment platform or orchestrator.

source.name: source
source.description: Source location of the source control repository. The source MUST be specified by a valid URL.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to a specific artifact file or directory of artifact files. Default value is '/' which would reference all of the files in the repository.

type.name: type
type.description: The source control type. Default value is 'git'.

branch.name: branch
branch.description: The source control branch. Default value is 'master'.

inherit.name: inherit
inherit.description: List of components whose artifacts will be added to the list of artifacts for the provider.
